name: Clever Girls: Gone Wild
description:
BREAK HEARTS, AND THE LAWS OF SCIENCE, WITH CLEVER GIRLS: GONE WILD!

Clever Girls: Gone Wild is a gay as hell romantic thriller, brought to you by RAPTOR CITY, the creators of CLEVER GIRLS NFT.

Did someone say No Fucking Thanks?

So did we, so we decided to do things a little differently.

Funded by our community, Clever Girls: Gone Wild is completely free to play, with no hidden fees, microtransactions, adverts or play-to-earn mechanics. 

Launching on September 1st 20221, CLEVER GIRLS was the world’s first queer generative PFP NFT collection. Designed by Fat Baby, a queer trans-masculine non-binary bisexual artist, the collection is a vibrant celebration of both pop culture and queer culture. In addition to a wide array of pop-culture references, the collection features traits that celebrate sex positivity, kink positivity, and queer iconography. 

The RAPTOR CITY team believes in taking direct action to support the LGBTQ+ community. To this end, we have donated £8000 to Mermaids, a UK charity that works with gender-diverse young people, and have contributed £15,000 to pay for top surgeries for transgender men and non-binary people. Finally, to minimise the environmental impact of our work, we have used Aerial.is to offset our carbon footprint by investing in forest conservation projects and carbon-capturing technologies.
